SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

net.rim.device.api.web
Interface WidgetConfig

public interface WidgetConfig

The WidgetConfig object stores information parsed from the config.xml and any additional information generated by the Web Component Pack.

Category:
Signed: This element is only accessible by signed applications. If you intend to use this element, please visit http://www.blackberry.com/go/codesigning to obtain a set of code signing keys. Code signing is only required for applications running on BlackBerry smartphones; development on BlackBerry Smartphone Simulators can occur without code signing.
Since:
BlackBerry API 5.0.0

Field Summary
static String WIDGET_LOCAL_DOMAIN
          The default string used to indicate the 'local' access tag - implicitly declared in config.xml.
 
Method Summary
 WidgetAccess[] getAccessList()
          Retrieves an array of WidgetAccess object representing the 'access' tags in the config.xml.
 String getAuthor()
          Widget author.
 String getAuthorEmail()
          Widget author's email.
 String getAuthorURL()
          Widget author's URL.

          Retrieves the document node for the config.xml used to generate this object.

          The 'content' element.

          The 'charset' attribute.

          The 'contentType' attribute.

          Widget's copyright info.

          Widget description.

          Retrieves a WidgetExtension for the corresponding feature ID.

          An enumeration of all the Javascript Extension to be loaded for this widget.

WIDGET_LOCAL_DOMAIN

static final String WIDGET_LOCAL_DOMAIN
The default string used to indicate the 'local' access tag - implicitly declared in config.xml.
